Package org.udem.unishop.repositories

Class UserRepository

java.lang.Object
org.udem.unishop.repositories.UserRepository
public class UserRepository extends Object
The UserRepository class is responsible for managing and persisting user data.

    • UserRepository

      public UserRepository(JSONHandler jsonHandler, String jsonFilePath)
      Constructor for UserRepository.
      Parameters:
      jsonHandler - The JSONHandler instance for reading and writing JSON data.
      jsonFilePath - The file path to the JSON file storing user data.

  • Method Details

    • findById

      public User findById(UUID userId)
      Finds a user by their unique identifier (ID).
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to find.
      Returns:
      The found user or null if not found.

    • findByUsername

      public User findByUsername(String username, AccountType accountType)
      Finds a user by their username and account type.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to find.
      accountType - The account type of the user to find.
      Returns:
      The found user or null if not found.

    • save

      public boolean save(User user)
      Saves a user to the repository and writes the updated data to the JSON file.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to save.
      Returns:
      true if the user is successfully saved, false otherwise.

    • delete

      public boolean delete(User user)
      Deletes a user from the repository and writes the updated data to the JSON file.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the user is successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • update

      public boolean update(User user)
      Updates a user in the repository and writes the updated data to the JSON file.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to update.
      Returns:
      true if the user is successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • getBuyerForTesting

      public Buyer getBuyerForTesting(String username)
      Gets a buyer for testing purposes based on the provided username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the buyer to retrieve for testing.
      Returns:
      The buyer with the specified username or null if not found.

    • getSellerForTesting

      public Seller getSellerForTesting(String username)
